briefTitle: Phase 3 Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate Sialic Acid in Patients With Glucosamine (UDP-N-acetyl)-2-epimerase Myopathy (GNEM) or Hereditary Inclusion Body Myopathy (HIBM)
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Sialic Acid Extended-Release Tablets in Patients With GNE Myopathy (GNEM) or Hereditary Inclusion Body Myopathy (HIBM)
summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the effect of 6 g/day aceneuramic acid extended-release (Ace-ER) treatment of participants with GNEM on upper extremity muscle strength (upper extremity composite \[UEC\] score) as measured by dynamometry.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in UEC Score (Total Force in kg) at Week 48
